an10.175:1.1: “Saparikkamano ayam, bhikkhave, dhammo, nayam dhammo aparikkamano.
an10.175:1.2: Kathanca, bhikkhave, saparikkamano ayam dhammo, nayam dhammo aparikkamano?
an10.175:1.3: Panatipatissa, bhikkhave, panatipata veramani parikkamanam hoti.
an10.175:1.4: Adinnadayissa, bhikkhave, adinnadana veramani parikkamanam hoti.
an10.175:1.5: Kamesumicchacarissa, bhikkhave, kamesumicchacara veramani parikkamanam hoti.
an10.175:1.6: Musavadissa, bhikkhave, musavada veramani parikkamanam hoti.
an10.175:1.7: Pisunavacassa, bhikkhave, pisunaya vacaya veramani parikkamanam hoti.
an10.175:1.8: Pharusavacassa, bhikkhave, pharusaya vacaya veramani parikkamanam hoti.
an10.175:1.9: Samphappalapissa, bhikkhave, samphappalapa veramani parikkamanam hoti.
an10.175:1.13: Evam kho, bhikkhave, saparikkamano ayam dhammo, nayam dhammo aparikkamano”ti.
